Ningxia Petrochemical 45/80 Fertilizer Project

Ningxia Petrochemical Fertilizer Project is a synthetic ammonia and urea process package of domestic projects. It is designed and developed by cooperation of Ningxia Petrochemical and Huanqiu Engineering Corporation. The project is listed as a key cooperation project by both.

As one of the few large laboratory EPC in China, PKchem (HK) is committed to professional, quality and perfection. With the requirements of the project, PKchem team actively integrates with the domestic equipment manufacturers and ensures that the maximization meets the requirements of analysis. A set of truly localized programs has been designed and it is has the greatest extent to meet the needs of the project.
